Original:
算是中山國中站附近少少的酒吧之一。

主打隱藏式的店中店，原本外面是間看似咖啡廳風格的空間，這次再來竟然也變成像是酒吧裝潢，那感覺應該就不太能算是店中店了...吧？

酒單的 signature 都是用 classic twist 方式來做，當晚點的四杯都屬於可以理解的方向但層次比較單薄，而且偏甜；若沒看到喜歡的，也可以用小卡選自己喜歡的基酒、風味還有酒感，讓調酒師幫你決定。

除了樓上吧檯座位，下面還有比較寬敞的座位/ 包廂區；需要注意的是，一樓內 bar 是可以抽菸的，不喜歡煙味的得斟酌斟酌。
EN:
It is one of the small bars near Zhongshan Junior High School.

The main store in the store, originally there is a space that looks like a cafe style. This time, it turned out to be like a bar decoration. Then I feel that it should not be considered a store in the store ... right?

The Signature of the wine list is made by classic twist. The four cups of that night are understandable but the level is thin and sweet. Wine, flavor and wine feel, let the bartender help you decide.

In addition to the bar seat upstairs, there is a relatively spacious seat/ box area. It should be noted that BAR can smoke in the first floor.

Original:
這是ㄧ家不隱密的speakeasy酒吧(畢竟店門口大大的寫了入口向內走ww)

很喜歡畫調酒卡的設計，還可以寫寫卡片抒發心情
挑戰Bartender的巧思。

酒的部分第一杯要求以威士忌為基底，純甜無酸的調酒
(卡上附註Bitters/又苦又甜)
Bartender給了我一杯平衡感十足，帶有冬瓜風味的調酒。
十分的好喝順口。
唯一有點可惜的是garnish幾乎沒有起到任何作用
仔細聞沒有味道，似乎也不能嚐，只能將其擺在一旁。
變成只有外觀的裝飾(一開始有點小興奮)

第二杯則是要求以Gin為基底，酒感最重酸甜平衡(附註:讓我睡著吧)。
得到了一杯茴香、迷迭香味很重，帶有藥草香氣的調酒。
特別的是店家使用了高成本的11號琴酒，有著驚人的酒感與醇厚的酒體。
但意外的是變成調酒後，我幾乎聞不到杜松子的味道，十分好喝 :)

結論，我認為這是ㄧ家很讓人放鬆的店，透過文字聯繫起調酒師和顧客。
值得一訪 (btw bartender / barback的顏值都非常高哦!)
EN:
This is the no -secret Speakeasy Bar (after all, the entrance of the store has a lot of entrance to go inward ww)

I really like the design of drawing a bartender card, you can also write a card to express your mood
Challenge Bartender's ingenuity.

The first cup of wine is required to be based on whiskey, pure sweet and acidic alcohol
(Note on the card bitters/bitter and sweet)
Bartender gave me a cup of balance, with winter melon flavor.
Very delicious.
The only thing that is a pity is that Garnish has almost no role
If you smell it carefully, you can't taste it, you can only put it aside.
It becomes a decoration with only appearance (a little excited at the beginning)

The second cup is required to be based on GIN, the most sour and sweet balance of wine (Note: Let me fall asleep).
I got a cup of fennel and rosemary.
In particular, the store uses high -cost No. 11 wine wine, with amazing wine and mellow wine.
But the unexpected thing was that after turning into a bartender, I could hardly smell the taste of Du Songzi, which was very delicious :)

Conclusion, I think this is a very relaxed shop, and the bartender and customers are connected through text.
It is worth visiting (btw Bartender / Barback's face value is very high!)

Original:
覺得被騙了..先不說義大利麵非常硬這件事。
這天點了溫泉蛋鮭魚義大利麵，開心的享用了卻發現魚並不是鮭魚..因為店裡燈光昏暗，趕緊用手機照明，好險..溫泉蛋還是蛋。可是鮭魚呢？我是因為愛吃鮭魚才點這項餐點的...
同為餐飲業，我能明白會有備貨不足需要更改配料或其他突發狀況。但畢竟菜單是寫鮭魚，不是魴魚、多利魚那種白肉魚塊。服務人員確實應該先來告知客人，要換餐點還是可以接受配料更改。最後結帳明細上寫「海皇xx義大利麵」雖然價格和鮭魚麵是一樣330，但他確實不是我點的餐點，這道菜也沒在菜單上。而貴店也確實在這個海皇義大利麵上加了顆溫泉蛋，當作溫泉蛋鮭魚義大利麵。今天我吃出來了，那其他沒吃出來的客人呢？不知道這樣的情況多久了，還是只有今天這樣？確實讓我有被騙的感受。

調酒的部分，因為是客製化的調酒，有服務人員非常貼心，送餐時會說明用了用了哪些酒品調製。卻也有服務人員表演了一場瀟灑走一回，放著就走，讓我們問的機會也沒給。好吧，我們也不想爬樓梯上去追問，於是大概花了些時間討論酒的口味是什麼水果、什麼利口酒😂 也算是幫我跟朋友們製造話題啦。
EN:
I feel deceived .. Let's not say that the pasta is very hard.
On this day, I ordered the hot spring egg salmon. I enjoyed it happily but found that the fish was not salmon .. Because the lights in the shop were dim, hurriedly used mobile phones to light up, good dangerous .. Hot spring eggs or eggs.But what about salmon?I just ordered this meal because I love salmon ...
As the restaurant industry, I can understand that there will be insufficient stocking and other emergencies.But after all, the menu is written with salmon, not white meat fish pieces such as catfish and Dali fish.The service staff should really tell the guests first, and you can accept the ingredients to change the meal.Finally, the checkout wrote "The Emperor XX Pasta". Although the price is the same as 330 as the salmon noodles, he is indeed not the meal I ordered, and this dish is not on the menu.And your shop does add a hot spring egg to the Emperor's Italian noodles as a hot spring egg and salmon.I ate it today, what about other guests who haven't eaten?I don’t know how long this situation has been, or is it only today?It really makes me feel deceived.

The bartending part is because of customized bartending, and the service staff is very intimate. When delivery, it will be explained which wine is used.However, some service staff performed a chic and walked back, letting go, and let us ask the opportunity to ask.Well, we don't want to climb the stairs to ask, so we spend about some time to discuss what fruit of the wine is and what kind of liquor.

Original: 調酒師想展現特色加入了芭樂汁與杏仁，但，老實說不好喝⋯另外，點的調酒雖然不差但也不至於驚艷。服務人員態度很好。
EN: The bartender wants to show the characteristics and add the bartender to the Berlite and almonds, but honestly, it is not delicious. In addition, although the ordee is not bad, it is not amazing.The service staff attitude is very good.

Original:
/環境/
酒吧採店中店設計，空間內融合了微古典與爵士的氛圍，再多了一點神秘，如果用一部電影來形容大概是艾蜜莉的異想世界吧。一進門，印入眼簾的是整面的KAVALAN，好拍程度大大加分，很適合帶姐妹來喝一杯。

/餐點/
這裡的餐點種類相當豐富，從主食類義大利麵、燉飯到牛排都有，最讓我驚艷的是這裡吃得到我最愛的櫻桃鴨胸，雖然是冷盤但依舊保有了柔嫩的質地，在尾韻還帶出了淡淡的燻香味。另外，同樣推薦的是東坡肉飯與炸起士酥。

/調酒/
這裡有分招牌「長島冰茶」與「洞」「香」「春」三款店家特調，另外則是無酒單設計，可以依照自己喜歡的風味去調整。這次我喝了三杯，依序是長島、春與Gin為基底的調酒，總體都很喜歡，每一杯的層次與香氣j都恰到平衡。推薦大家第一次來可以選擇一杯屬於自己的調酒。
EN:
/environment/
The design of the shop in the bar is designed. The space is combined with the atmosphere of the ancient and the jazz, and there is a little more mysterious. If you use a movie to describe it about Emily's imaginative world.As soon as I entered the door, I was printed with the entire Kavalan.

/Meals/
The types of meals here are quite rich. From the pasta, the pasta, stew to steak, the most amazing thing is that I can eat my favorite cherry duck breast here. Although it is a cold disk, it still keeps a tender texture. The rhyme also brought out a faint scent.In addition, Dongpo meat rice and fried cakes are also recommended.

/Bartender/
Here are three stores: "Long Island Ice Tea" and "Cave", "Xiang" and "Spring". In addition, there are no wine single designs. You can adjust according to your favorite flavor.This time I drank three cups, in order, the bartending of Long Island, Chun and GIN. Overall I like it, and the level and aroma J of each cup are just balanced.Recommend everyone for the first time to choose a cup of bartending.

Original:
第一次給一顆星 蠻失望最後的評價會是這樣
食物好吃 威士忌讚 調酒普通
因為在公司附近常來 起碼有10次左右
今天跟同事來 絕對是在正常使用下（全桌見證）吃冰塊 酒杯出現裂痕後碎裂 還刮到手一個小洞
沒特別跟店員反應 沒想到來收杯子時店員第一時間表示要罰款2百元

2百元也沒什麼 跟我們4個人*3杯酒 消費近8千元相較九牛一毛
只是當下真的傻眼 和店員說明使用過程 店員表示他們知道這個杯子很薄 也有其他客人發生同樣狀況 希望大家小心使用

當下還真不知道是誰邏輯有問題
1.不止一組客人發生同樣狀況 該檢討的是店家還是消費者 還是罰款兩百是店內招待餘興節目😊
2.希望大家小心使用 送餐時我們全桌可沒聽到任何一句提醒 可能真的需要通靈才會和店家心電感應

同事和店員加點酒時 再次說明全桌都看到是正常使用下杯子碎裂 店員重複上述表示仍須照規則收罰款 但會招待shot致意
到結帳出店門也沒看到國王的shot 肯定是聰明人才看得見

以上所言句句屬實
希望大家到訪都能人杯平安
阿彌陀佛🙏

The first time I gave a star disappointment, the final evaluation would be like this
Food delicious whiskey praise bartender ordinary
Because there are often about 10 times near the company
Today, I came with my colleagues. Under normal use (witnesses on the whole table) eating ice wine glasses, the cracks were broken after the cracks appeared.

There is nothing to do with 4 people*3 glasses of wine for nearly 8,000 yuan compared to Jiu Niu a hair.
But at the moment, the clerk really explained that the clerk said that they knew that the cup was very thin and there were other guests in the same situation. I hope everyone will use it carefully.

I really don’t know who has a problem with the logic at the moment
1. More than one group of guests occur in the same situation. What should be reviewed whether the store or consumer or the fine of two hundred is the entertainment of the Yu Xing show in the store 😊
2. I hope that when you use the meals, we have not heard any reminder.

When colleagues and clerks add some wine, they once again explained that the whole table saw that the next cup broke the clerk repeatedly that the above indicates that the above indicates that the fine must be received according to the rules
I didn’t see the king's Shot if I got out of the store and went out to the store.

The above sentences are true
